Title: Relates to requiring training of police department and state police personnel on the protocols of the address confidentiality program
Summary: Requires the secretary of state to develop and mandate annual training of police department personnel and state police officers on the protocols of the address confidentiality program.
LawCode: Amd §§840 & 108, Exec L; add §214-j, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to training of state police and local police departments on the address confidentiality program
